title: This Website
description: This is something that almost every other developer makes, yes a goddamn portfolio. Well this is not a portfolio, this started as a blog website and later I named Rayshold to keep things related to me.

highlights.title: Optimized SEO
highlights.description: Structured metadata, Open Graph images, and canonical URLs ensure top-tier discoverability, scoring 100% in Lighthouse SEO.

highlights.title: Blazing-Fast Blog
highlights.description: Craft content in Markdown and MDX with React components, designed for speed, scoring 95+ in Lighthouse performance.

highlights.title: Silky-Smooth Experience
highlights.description: Built with Tailwind CSS and minimal CSS animations, delivering seamless performance, even on low-end devices.

highlights.title: Open Source
highlights.description: This project is open source under the MIT license, so you can do whatever you want with it as the license permits.
